alert.note: Alert for Kendall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:28AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Kendall County through 700 AM CDT... At 628 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Holiday to near Newark. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plano around 645 AM CDT. Yorkville around 650 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Millbrook, Plattville and Millington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
